original_title: Argentina sangra por las barrancas del río Paraná
overview: Research work, which in audiovisual format, summarizes the data and central axes of the book "Argentina bleeds through the ravines of the Paraná river" by Luciano Orellano. A precise and meticulous description of the springs of dependency, and the looting of the agro-export model.
title: Argentina sangra por las barrancas del río Paraná
